job_details.Functieomschrijving:
Are you a software consultant who has relied on LLMs to make life easier for most of your career? Are you afraid your hard skills will atrophy if you continue spending most of your day on low-skill tasks? Jigsaw is revolutionizing consulting by harnessing the power of AI to cut through the noise and let you focus on what truly matters: delivering high-impact results for clients. If you're driven by innovation and want to be at the forefront of AI-enhanced project delivery, this role is tailor-made for you.

   Jigsaw is fundamentally rethinking how projects are delivered, using generative AI to automate the mundane and elevate the strategic. Say goodbye to the grind of manual configuration, which you are overqualified to do anyway, and hello to a world where AI does the heavy lifting, freeing you to focus on building systems and delivering unparalleled client service.

   This isn't your average consulting gig. If you're looking to spend your days entrenched in manual tasks, this isn't the job for you. Instead, we need someone who thrives on using AI to push boundaries, someone who relishes the challenge of aligning technology with client business goals. You'll be advising on everything from survey design to panel creation, all while ensuring that the solutions you deliver are flawlessly aligned with client expectations.

   Join us if you're excited by the idea of transforming the consulting landscape, if you want to leave behind the old ways and embrace a role where your strategic input has real, measurable impact. This is your chance to be part of a team that's not just keeping up with the future of consulting but defining it. If that sounds like you, we want to hear from you.

   What you will be doing

     * AI-Enhanced Project Delivery: Using generative AI to improve project delivery, customer communications, and validation of project deliverables.
     * Consulting Services: Gathering and analyzing customer business requirements, advising on survey structure, best practices for panel creation, and training clients on the software platform.
     * Configuration Services: Configuring surveys, panels, and data gathering processes within the software platform.

   What you will NOT be doing

     * Manually reviewing every knowledge base article and Excel trackers
     * Creating slide decks
     * Traveling to client sites
     * Coding or programming
job_details.full_text:
Implementation Engineer, Jigsaw (Remote) - $60,000/year USD

Are you a software consultant who has relied on LLMs to make life easier for most of your career? Are you afraid your hard skills will atrophy if you continue spending most of your day on low-skill tasks? Jigsaw is revolutionizing consulting by harnessing the power of AI to cut through the noise and let you focus on what truly matters: delivering high-impact results for clients. If you're driven by innovation and want to be at the forefront of AI-enhanced project delivery, this role is tailor-made for you.

   Jigsaw is fundamentally rethinking how projects are delivered, using generative AI to automate the mundane and elevate the strategic. Say goodbye to the grind of manual configuration, which you are overqualified to do anyway, and hello to a world where AI does the heavy lifting, freeing you to focus on building systems and delivering unparalleled client service.

   This isn't your average consulting gig. If you're looking to spend your days entrenched in manual tasks, this isn't the job for you. Instead, we need someone who thrives on using AI to push boundaries, someone who relishes the challenge of aligning technology with client business goals. You'll be advising on everything from survey design to panel creation, all while ensuring that the solutions you deliver are flawlessly aligned with client expectations.

   Join us if you're excited by the idea of transforming the consulting landscape, if you want to leave behind the old ways and embrace a role where your strategic input has real, measurable impact. This is your chance to be part of a team that's not just keeping up with the future of consulting but defining it. If that sounds like you, we want to hear from you.

   What you will be doing

     * AI-Enhanced Project Delivery: Using generative AI to improve project delivery, customer communications, and validation of project deliverables.
     * Consulting Services: Gathering and analyzing customer business requirements, advising on survey structure, best practices for panel creation, and training clients on the software platform.
     * Configuration Services: Configuring surveys, panels, and data gathering processes within the software platform.

   What you will NOT be doing

     * Manually reviewing every knowledge base article and Excel trackers
     * Creating slide decks
     * Traveling to client sites
     * Coding or programming

profile_classification.rationale: The job description focuses heavily on the application and utilization of AI tools to enhance productivity in consulting services, rather than the development, fine-tuning, or deep technical implementation of AI models. While it mentions 'generative AI' and 'AI-enhanced project delivery,' it explicitly states 'Coding or programming' is not part of the role, and the core tasks involve advising, configuring, and using AI to automate mundane tasks. This aligns with the definition of the 'Ambiguous' profile, which is for roles primarily focused on the use of AI tools for productivity enhancement or non-technical roles.

job_tasks.justification: The role involves gathering and analyzing customer business requirements, advising on survey structure, and aligning solutions with client expectations, which demonstrates an understanding of business context and translating needs.
job_tasks.phrase: Gathering and analyzing customer business requirements, advising on survey structure, best practices for panel creation, and training clients on the software platform.

job_tasks.justification: The job emphasizes aligning technology with client business goals and delivering high-impact results, indicating a focus on business understanding.
job_tasks.phrase: aligning technology with client business goals

job_tasks.justification: The role is about revolutionizing consulting by harnessing AI to focus on what truly matters: delivering high-impact results for clients.

The description mentions using generative AI to automate mundane tasks and improve project delivery, which falls under the broad umbrella of applying generative models, even if not building them from scratch.
job_tasks.phrase: using generative AI to automate the mundane

job_tasks.justification: The core of the role is AI-Enhanced Project Delivery, using generative AI to improve various aspects of project execution.
job_tasks.phrase: AI-Enhanced Project Delivery: Using generative AI to improve project delivery, customer communications, and validation of project deliverables.

job_tasks.justification: Although explicitly stating 'Coding or programming' is not part of the role, the description mentions 'building systems' which implies some level of system configuration or integration that could be considered a form of software development in a broader sense, but the explicit exclusion of coding makes this weak.

The role involves configuring surveys, panels, and data gathering processes within the software platform, which can be seen as a form of operational configuration and setup, though not traditional MLOps.
job_tasks.phrase: Configuring surveys, panels, and data gathering processes within the software platform.

soft_skills.phrase: focus on building systems and delivering unparalleled client service
focus on what truly matters: delivering high-impact results for clients
thrives on using AI to push boundaries
leave behind the old ways and embrace a role where your strategic input has real, measurable impact
